description: When ADAPT data is consolidated into a single dataset (usually as physical files), the Root component acts as the top level entity that contains all available data.  It is serialized as "adapt.json."  Note that it is also possible to use json representations of individual ADAPT components in a distributed service architecture without the container entities (Root, Catalog, Documents, etc.)

catalog.description: Container for data types that are fixed, infrequently changing, or otherwise prerequisite to transactional data.  Master or Reference data, often called Setup or Coding data in agricultural applications.

documents.description: Container for transactional, frequently changing data.   Documents will necessarily reference master data defined in the Catalog.

dataTypeDefinitionVersion.description: Version of the Standard Data Type Definitions used.  If omitted, the current version is assumed.

unitSystemVersion.description: Version identifier describing the ADAPT Unit System used throughout the model.   If omitted, the current version is assumed.

a.description: The A point (WKT) of an AB or A+ Line

activeBoundaryId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Field Boundary, representing the one boundary that is current

addressContactTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Address Contact Type data type definition

addressLine.description: A single Address line, composing part of the section before the City, Country, etc.

b.description: The B point (WKT) of an AB Line

boundaryGeometry.description: Polygon or Multi Polygon WKT representing the enclosing area of an object.

brandId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Brand

centerPoint.description: WKT Coordinates for the center of an object.

city.description: The city for the purposes of defining an Address

code.description: Code for the item, taken from the list of valid codes for a given Enumerated Data Type Definition.   Required.

country.description: The country defined within an Address

countryCode.description: An ISO 3166 alpha-2 code for a Country

countrySubdivision.description: Subdivision or region of a country such as a state or province.

cropId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Crop

cropNutritionIngredientItemCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Crop Nutrition Ingredient data type definition

cropZoneId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Crop Zone

dataDefinitionBaseTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Data Definition Base Type data type definition

dataDefinitionStatusCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Data Definition Status data type definition

dataTypeDefinitionVersion.description: Version of a Data Type Definition.  Uses Semantic Versioning to identify updates to the entirety of the standard Data Types Definition list.

dateContextCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Date Context data type definition

defaultRate.description: The default rate for a Prescribed Rate.

definitionCode.description:
Code identifying a Data Type Definition, either in the standard Adapt list or within the Custom Data Type 
Definitions in this Adapt instance.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.

deviceId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Device

deviceModelId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Device Model

deviceSeries.description: The name of any formal Series in which the Device Model is included.

documentRelationshipTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Document Relationship Type data type definition

end.description: The date and time (UTC) at the end of an event.

endPoint.description: WKT coordinates for the end point of an object

enumerationItemStatusCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Data Definition Status data type definition

farmId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Farm

fieldId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Field

fileDataIndex.description: The column or band index for a specific variable within an external file.

geometry.description: The geometry of an object in Well Known Text

gNSSUTCTime.description: The UTC time as reported by GNSS

growerId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Grower

guidanceGroupId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Guidance Group

guidancePatternExtensionCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Guidance Pattern Extension data type definition

guidancePatternId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Guidance Pattern

guidancePatternPropagationDirectionCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Guidance Pattern Propagation Direction data type definition

guidancePatternTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Guidance Pattern Type data type definition

harvestLoadIdentifier.description: The textual identifier of a harvest load.  E.g., "Load 1"

hasBiological.description: Whether the CropProtectionProduct contains biological ingredients

hasCarbamate.description: Whether the CropProtectionProduct contains carbamate ingredients

hasOrganophosphate.description: Whether the CropProtectionProduct contains organophosphate ingredients

heading.description: Direction of heading, in arc degrees from north

idSource.description: The source of the Unique Id

idSourceTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Id Source Type data type definition

idText.description: The actual ID of a Unique ID within a Compound ID

idTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Id Type data type definition

isActiveIngredient.description: True for active ingredients, false for inert ingredients

isCarrier.description: True if this component represents the primary (generally liquid) contents of a mix

isClockwise.description: True if clockwise, false if counter-clockwise

isManure.description: Whether a Crop Nutrition product is manure.

isPassable.description: Whether the boundary may be crossed with a vehicle, e.g., a grass waterway (true) vs. a rock pile (false)

iSO3166-2Code.description: Code for a geographic region, as defined by ISO 3166-2.   I.e., a two-digit code for the country, followed by a code for the subdivision.  E.g., US-CA for California.

keywords.description: Textual strings used for identification in searches

languageCode.description: A language as defined by the code in ISO 639-1, with an optional identifier for the ISO 3166-1 Alpha 2 Code for the geography.   E.g. "pt", "pt-BR"

layerTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Layer Type data type definition

lineStrings.description: One or more Line Strings in Well Known Text as a Line String or Multi Line String

lossOfGNSSRate.description: A default prescribed rate for a Product should the implement lose its position signal

manufacturerId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Manufacturer.

mixOrder.description:
In what order was this component added to the mix? (1 = First).
Can have duplicate numbers, representing a situation where two or more components are added simultaneously.

name.description: A short textual string by which an item is known.

note.description: A textual comment associated to a particular object adding contextual information.

numberOfSegments.description: For an ABCurve, the number of segments in the curve

numberOfSwathsLeft.description: How many swaths a guidance pattern extends left

numberOfSwathsRight.description: How many swaths a guidance pattern extends right

numericDataTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Numeric Data Type data type definition

operationTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Operation Type data type definition

originatingDocumentId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of another document from which this document results

outOfFieldRate.description: Prescribed rate for the product when the implement is determined to be outside of the targeted area.  Optional.

parentId.description: A mapping id to the Reference ID of an object of the same type defined as the logical parent of the current object.

parentPartyId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of another Party that represents the logical parent to this Party within a hierarchy.

partyId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Party

partyTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Party Type data type definition

postalCode.description: A postal code within an Address

prescribingOperationId.description: Id mapping to the Reference ID of another Operation defined in this dataset representing the preliminary Operation that prescribed this Operation.

productFormCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Product Form data type definition

productId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Product

productStatusCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Product Status data type definition

productTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Product Type data type definition

referenceId.description: A string that uniquely identifies an object with a single data instance.

referenceLayerId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Reference Layer

roleCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Role data type definition

scopeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Scope data type definition

seasonId.description: An id mapping to the Reference Id of a Season

serialNumber.description: The serial number of a manufactured product

spatialRecordsFile.description: A reference to the file/URL containing specific Spatial Records for this Operation, Prescription or Reference Layer. When the model is serialized to disk, this file must reside within the same directory as the ApplicationDataModel itself.    Vector data must be in GeoParquet format and raster data in GeoTiff format with columns/bands ordered as specified by the File Data Index on the variable definitions.

start.description: The date and time (UTC) at the start of an event.

startPoint.description: WKT coordinates for the start point of an object.

supersededByCode.description: Code identifying a different Data Type Definition or Enumeration Item that supersedes this item.  Required and relevant only when the status of the current item is SUPERSEDED.

telecommunicationContactTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Telecommunication Contact Type data type definition

timeZone.description: Time zone identifier from the IANA/tz database, defining the local time zone at a location. May be used to interpret ADAPT's required UTC timestamps into a local times for that location.

unitOfMeasureCode.description: A code defining a Unit of Measure in the Adapt Unit Of Measure system

unitSystemVersion.description: Version of a Unit System.  Uses Semantic Versioning to identify updates to the entirety of the unit list.

validationRegularExpression.description: Regular Expression to be used for validation.

valueText.description: The value of this contact item.  E.g., phone number.

varietyIsGeneticallyEnhanced.description: For varieties, optional indicator to signify that the variety is genetically enhanced.

aPlusAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for APlus Guidance Patterns

aBCurveAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for an ABCurve Guidance Pattern

numberOfSegments.description: For an ABCurve, the number of segments in the curve

lineStrings.description: One or more line strings that compose the curve. Required.

aBLineAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for the ABLine guidance pattern

addressContactMethod.description: An address for someone or something.

addressLines.description: Address lines that precede the City.   Street address, PO Box, etc.

postalCode.description: The postal code within the Address

countrySubdivision.description: Subdivision or region of a country such as a state or province, including entries in ISO-3166.

country.description: The country defined within the Address

addressContactTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Address Contact Type Representation

arableArea.description: A Numeric Value indicating the area

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

brand.description: A trade name under which a Manufacturer markets a good. Also known as Make in vehicles/equipment.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

catalog.description: Container for data types that are fixed, infrequently changing, or otherwise prerequisite to transactional data.  Master or Reference data, often called Setup or Coding data in agricultural applications.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

cropZones.description: All Crop Zones in the data

customDataTypeDefinitions.description: Any custom Data Type Definitions defined by the producer for this data.  By default, this list is empty and all definitions are sourced from the ADAPT Standard Data Type Definitions.

deviceModels.description: All Device Models in the data

fieldBoundaries.description: All Field Boundaries in the data

guidanceGroups.description: All Guidance Groups in the data

guidancePatterns.description: All Guidance Patterns in the data

contactInfo.description: Contact Information for an individual/business entity

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

addressContactMethods.description: Any Addresses as part of this Contact Info

telecommunicationContactMethods.description: Any telephone numbers/email addresses as part of this Contact Info

contextItem.description: Additional information with which a data element is tagged.

definitionCode.description:
Code identifying a Data Type Definition, either in the ADAPT Standard Data Type Definitions or within the Catalog.Custom Data Type 
Definitions.   Required.

valueText.description: The value of the Context Item expressed in text.  Required unless nested Context Items are used as the values.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes governing the Context Item

contextItems.description: Nested Context Items used as the value for this Context item. Either this property or Value Text is required.
List of supplemental information with which a data element is tagged.

crop.description: A plant or animal type cultivated for agricultural produce.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

parentId.description: Reference Id of the Crop identified as the hierarchical parent to this crop in the given crop taxonomy

referenceWeight.description: Reference weight for the crop.  E.g., 56 lb/bu.

standardPayableMoisture.description: The targeted moisture value at which the commodity is sold.  E.g., 15.5%

cropIds.description: Ids mapping to the Reference Id of a Crop

cropNutritionProductAttributes.description: Product Attributes relevant for Crop Nutrition products

ingredients.description: Any defined Ingredients on this Product

isManure.description: Whether a Crop Nutrition product is manure.

cropProtectionProductAttributes.description: Product Attributes relevant for Products of type Crop Protection.

ingredients.description: Any defined Ingredients on this Product

hasCarbamate.description: Whether the CropProtectionProduct contains carbamate ingredients

hasOrganophosphate.description: Whether the CropProtectionProduct contains organophosphate ingredients

hasBiological.description: Whether the CropProtectionProduct contains biological ingredients

cropVarietyProductAttributes.description: Product attributes relevant when the type is Crop Variety

traits.description: Any defined genetic Traits on this Variety.

varietyIsGeneticallyEnhanced.description: For varieties, optional indicator to signify that the variety is genetically enhanced.

cropZone.description: A more detailed representation of/within a Field, defining a crop, its growing season and usually a separate boundary.   Where Crop Zone is used, Field is also required.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes describing the Crop Zone.   Season should be reported separately via Season Ids.

fieldId.description: Required mapping to the parent field

seasonIds.description: One or more seasons to which this Cropzone relates.

arableArea.description: Total area of the Crop Zone that is cultivated, excluding areas such as waterways

boundaryGeometry.description: The boundary polygon/multipolygon defining the Crop Zone region

gNSSSource.description: Optional GNSS provenance data for the Cropzone boundary

notes.description: Any Notes on the Crop Zone

guidanceGroupIds.description: Mappings to any Guidance Groups for this Crop Zone

cropZoneIds.description: Ids mapping to the Reference Id of a Crop Zone

customDataTypeDefinitions.description: A list of Custom Data Type Definitions

dataTypeDefinition.description: The definition of a type of data, as may exist either in the published list of standard types or to types defined within an individual data instance.

definitionCode.description:
Code identifying a Data Type Definition, either in the standard list or within the Custom Data Type 
Definitions in this data instance.  Required.

name.description: The short name of the Data Type Definition

description.description: A long description.  Optional.

dataDefinitionBaseTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Data Definition Base Type data type definition.  Required.

dataDefinitionStatusCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Data Definition Status data type definition.  Required.

supersededByCode.description: Code identifying a different Data Type Definition that replaces this one.  Required and relevant only when the status of the current item is SUPERSEDED.

scopes.description: Any Scopes on the Data Type Representation

geoPoliticalContexts.description: Any Geo Political Contexts to which the Data Type Definition applies

keywords.description: Textual strings used for identification in searches.   Optional.

numericDataTypeDefinitionAttributes.description: Numeric type attributes.   Required if Base Type is Numeric.

enumeratedDataTypeDefinitionAttributes.description: Numeric type attributes.   Required if Base Type is Enumerated.

textDataTypeDefinitionAttributes.description: Numeric type attributes.   Required if Base Type is Text.

density.description: The density of the product (mass per volume)

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

documents.description: Container for transactional, frequently changing data.   Documents will necessarily reference master data defined in the Catalog.

workOrders.description: All Work Orders in the data

workRecords.description: All Work Records in the data

referenceLayers.description: All Reference Layers in the data

enumerationItem.description: An enumeration item within an enumeration

code.description: Code for the item, taken from the list of valid codes for a given Enumerated Data Type Definition.   Required.

name.description: Name of item.  Required.

description.description: Optional description of item

farm.description: A collection of fields grouped together as a common organizational unit, often reflecting shared location or historical ownership.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

growerId.description: Reference Id of the Grower entity that is a parent to this Farm

partyId.description: Optional mapping to a Party specifically defining the Farm.  E.g., a large Grower has subsidiary entities for its individual Farms

field.description: A named, farmer-accepted physical space where production agriculture takes place.  Used to partition and identify data.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

farmId.description: Mapping to a Farm containing this field.   If the source data model does not use the farm concept and maps the field directly to a grower, the data producer must create a Farm with the Grower name to complete the data linkage.

arableArea.description: Total area of the Field that is cultivated, excluding areas such as waterways

activeBoundaryId.description: The Reference Id of the FieldBoundary currently active for this field

guidanceGroupIds.description: Mappings to any Guidance Groups for this Field

timeZone.description: Time zone identifier from the IANA/tz database, defining the local time zone at a location. May be used to interpret ADAPT's required UTC timestamps into a local times for that location.  Optional.

fieldBoundary.description: A geometry that identifies the geospatial coordinates of a field. The boundary can be used to define the area for a particular operation, a particular crop or crops, or for legal purposes. A field can have different boundaries that may vary in geometry based on their specific use, but it is always either a polygon or multi-polygon.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

fieldId.description: Mapping to the Field that is the logical parent of this Field Boundary

seasonIds.description: Any specific Seasons to which this boundary applies.

geometry.description: The geospatial definition of the boundary.  Required.  Must be a Polygon or Multi Polygon.

obstacles.description: Any Obstacles defined within this Field Boundary

gNSSSource.description: The type and quality of the GNSS readings that defined this boundary.   Optional.

headlands.description: Any Headland geometries on the Field Boundary

fieldIds.description: Ids mapping to the Reference Id of a Field

geoPoliticalContext.description: The Country/Region to which a concept applies

geoNamesId.description: Geopolitical Ontology Id from GeoNames.org to add further administrative/locational specificity beyond the ISO3166-2 Code.  Optional.

description.description: Optional description

geoPoliticalContexts.description: A list of Geo Political Contexts

gNSSSource.description: The type and quality of a GNSS reading

estimatedPrecision.description: Estimated precision of the GNSS reading(s)

horizontalAccuracy.description: The accuracy of the horizontal data in the GNSS reading(s)

verticalAccuracy.description: The accuracy of the vertical data in the GNSS reading(s)

gNSSUTCTime.description: The UTC time as reported by GNSS corresponding to this source information.

grower.description: An individual/business entity engaged in agricultural production.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

partyId.description: Optional mapping to a Party for detailed individual/entity information.

guidanceAllocation.description: A instance of specific Guidance Pattern data as applied to a planned or actual field operation.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes defining the application of the Guidance Allocation

guidanceGroup.description: A container for guidance patterns to be used together, e.g., a headland pattern and a main field pattern

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

guidancePatternIds.description: List of the Guidance Patterns in this Group.   Required.

boundaryGeometry.description: Geometry defining the spatial extent of the Guidance Group

guidancePattern.description: A geospatial definition used to guide a vehicle in a field

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

guidancePatternTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Guidance Pattern Type Representation.  Required.

gNSSSource.description: The type and quality of the GNSS reading when the pattern was created.   Optional.

swathWidth.description: Any implement width to which the Guidance Pattern is specifically intended.  Optional.

guidancePatternPropagationDirectionCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Guidance Pattern Propagation Direction Representation.  Optional.

guidancePatternExtensionCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Guidance Pattern Extension Representation.  Optional.

numberOfSwathsLeft.description: Number of swaths to propagate the pattern to the left.  Optional.

numberOfSwathsRight.description: Number of swaths to propagate the pattern to the right.  Optional.

boundaryGeometry.description: Any fixed spatial extent in which the Guidance Pattern is valid.  Optional.

aBCurveAttributes.description: Definition of a ABCurve Guidance Pattern.  Required when GuidancePatternType is ABCurve .

aBLineAttributes.description: Definition of a ABLine Guidance Pattern.  Required when GuidancePatternType is ABCurve .

aPlusAttributes.description: Definition of a APlus Guidance Pattern.  Required when GuidancePatternType is APlus.

pivotAttributes.description: Definition of a Pivot Guidance Pattern.  Required when GuidancePatternType is Pivot.

spiralAttributes.description: Definition of a Spiral Guidance Pattern.  Required when GuidancePatternType is Spiral.

guidancePatternIds.description: Ids mapping to the Reference Id of a Guidance Pattern

guidanceShift.description: Shift information added to Guidance Patterns during a specific field operation, mapped to that LoggedData via the Guidance Allocation component

eastShift.description: The shift East of a guidance pattern

northShift.description: The North shift of a Guidance Pattern

propagationOffset.description: Perpendicular offset of a guidance pattern by a fixed offset.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes governing the application of this Guidance Shift.

headland.description: Ground near the ends of a field that is cultivated differently than the main body of the field

geometry.description: Polygon / Multi Polygon defining the Headland.   Required.

horizontalAccuracy.description: Numerical value for the horizontal accuracy.

referenceId.description: A unique string that identifies an object within a single data instance. Required.

uniqueIds.description: Optional persistent ids for this component.

ingredient.description: A basic (non-product) ingredient within a Product.   Often a chemical element or compound.

isActiveIngredient.description: Required for Crop Protection products.  True if this is an active ingredient.   False if it is an inert ingredient.   Omitted for Crop Nutrition Ingredients.

items.description: List of enumerated items within an enumeration.

label.description: A version of text represented in a specific language.

manufacturer.description: The entity who manufactured a given market good.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

mixTotalQuantity.description: The total quantity of the mix recipe.  Required.
For products of type mix, the total quantity of the mix recipe.

obstacle.description: A spatial object that directly affects the execution of a field operation, such as a waterway, rockpile, or grove of trees.

geometry.description: Spatial definition of the Obstacle.   Required.

isPassable.description: Whether the boundary may be crossed with a vehicle, e.g., a grass waterway (true) vs. a rock pile (false)

obstacles.description: Any Obstacles within a Field Boundary

operation.description: Records for a single OperationType on a single Field at one time.  If Device Configuration is specified (implements are known), data from each separate Device must be in a separate Operation.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

operationTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Operation Type Representation.  Required.

variables.description:
Variables used within Spatial Records and/or Summary Values.   Usually required unless the Operation simply records general information without any rates or totals. E.g., that a certain field was planted with a particular product.

Variables describe the data logged within a completed Operation, and the prescribed rates for a planned Operation.

spatialRecordsFile.description: A reference to the file/URL containing specific Spatial Records for this Operation, Prescription or Reference Layer. When the model is serialized to disk, this file must reside within the same directory as the ApplicationDataModel itself.    Vector data must be in GeoParquet format and raster data in GeoTiff format with columns/bands ordered as specified by the File Data Index on the variable definitions.

summaryValues.description: Averages or Totals for specific Variables used either as manually-entered logged data or flat rate prescriptions.   Where a Summary Value maps to a Variable with a (spatial) File Data Index, the Summary Value can be interpreted to summarize the spatial data in that column.

deviceConfiguration.description: A mapping to a specific Device Configuration where the Device for the Operation is known.

harvestLoadIdentifier.description: On Work Record Operations, the textual identifier of a harvest load.  E.g., "Load 1".  Separate loads must be tracked as separate Operations.  Any load quantities may consequently be tracked as Summary Values.

prescribingOperationId.description: Mapping to other Operation defined within this dataset that prescribed this Operation.   The prescribing operation would generally be part of a Work Order, Recommendation or Plan.

productIds.description: List of mappings to Products used in the Operation.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes on the Operation.   E.g., the Start and End time of the Operation.

partyRoles.description: Any Parties/Roles associated to this Operation.  E.g., the equipment operator for the Operation.

guidanceAllocations.description: Any Guidance Allocations associated to this Operation

boundaryGeometry.description: The boundary of this Operation.  Optional.

referenceLayerIds.description: Mappings to any Reference Layers relating to this Operation

operations.description: Collections of records for a single OperationType on a single Field at one time.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

partyTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Party Type Representation.  Required.

parentPartyId.description: Any other Party that represents the logical parent to this Party within a hierarchy.

partyRole.description: The function assumed by an individual or business entity for a specific time and purpose.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes that limit the period in which this role applies.

roleCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Role Representation.    Required.

pivotAttributes.description: Relevant Attributes for the Pivot Guidance Pattern.   One of the three pivot definitions is required.

centerPoint.description: WKT for the center point of the pivot.  Required.

startPoint.description: WKT for a start point of the pivot.   Required for partial pivots.

endPoint.description: WKT for an end point of the pivot.   Required for partial pivots.

isClockwise.description: Pivot direction. True for clockwise.  False for counter clockwise.   Required for Partial Pivots

plan.description: Document collecting operational intent for a growing season. A plan may define a collection of intended Crop Zones, defining a crop for each field/partial field and may further define dates and intended operations (WorkItems).  Alternatively, a Plan may simply define a number of acres of a given crop to be planted across the operation. Multiple mutually exclusive plans may exist for a single season to allow for runtime flexibility. A plan documents management intent.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

documentCorrelations.description: Optional collection of correlations to other Documents within this data instance.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes describing the Document

cropIds.description: Mappings to any Crops in this document.

estimatedArea.description: The estimated area planned/recommended.  Generally used in cases where a certain amount of a crop of is planned without spatial reference.  If this property is set, Field Ids and Crop Zone Ids may not be set.

fieldIds.description: Mappings to any Fields in this document.

cropZoneIds.description: Mappings to any Crop Zones in this document.

operations.description: Operations that make up the Plan.  Required.

plans.description: Documents collecting operational intent for a growing season

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

brandId.description: Where known, the id of the product brand.

density.description: The density of the product (mass per volume)

specificGravity.description: The unitless specific gravity ratio of the product

manufacturerId.description: Where known, the id of the product manufacturer.

productComponents.description: Optional list of the components that make up this product.

productTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Product Type Representation.  Required.

mixProductAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for products of type Mix

cropVarietyProductAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for products of type Crop Variety

cropNutritionProductAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for products of type Crop Nutrition Product

cropProtectionProductAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for products of type Crop Protection Product

productFormCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Product Form Representation.   Required.

productStatusCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Product Status Representation.   Optional.

productComponent.description: Details on an individual component that comprises part of a Product.

quantity.description:
Quantity may be set in any appropriate Representation.
E.g.s, vrProvidedAmountMass, vrProvidedAmountVolume, vrProductContent, vrSolutionRateLiquid, vrActiveIngredientMassPerMass, etc.

isCarrier.description: True if this component represents the primary (generally liquid) contents of a mix

mixOrder.description:
In what order was this component added to the mix? (1 = First).
Can have duplicate numbers, representing a situation where two or more components are added simultaneously.

productId.description: Mapping to the product that defines this component.

productIds.description: Ids mapping to the Reference Id of a Product

propagationOffset.description: Perpendicular offset of a guidance pattern by a fixed offset.

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

quantity.description:
Quantity may be set in any appropriate Representation.
E.g.s, vrProvidedAmountMass, vrProvidedAmountVolume, vrProductContent, vrSolutionRateLiquid, vrActiveIngredientMassPerMass, etc.

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

radius.description: The radius of a center pivot

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

recommendation.description:
Document summarizing guidance to a Grower from an advisor.  An example might be recommendations for amounts of specific crops to plant from a financial or market advisor, specific varieties or crop protection chemicals to use from an agronomic advisor, etc.

E.g.s, if an advisor recommends a Grower plant a specific variety on 3 fields, the Recommendation.FieldIds would map to those fields, and there would be one Operation of type Application - Sowing and Planting simply referring to the product id of the recommended variety.

If an advisor is recommending the Grower apply a certain crop protection chemical for all fields with a certain crop, the Recommendation.CropIds would map to a single crop, and there would be one Operation of type Application - Crop Protection, mapping to the product id of the specified chemical, optionally containing a Time Scopes object to specify the recommended date range.

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes describing the Document

cropIds.description: Mappings to any Crops in this document.

estimatedArea.description: The estimated area planned/recommended.  Generally used in cases where a certain amount of a crop of is planned without spatial reference.  If this property is set, Field Ids and Crop Zone Ids may not be set.

fieldIds.description: Mappings to any Fields in this document.

cropZoneIds.description: Mappings to any Crop Zones in this document.

operations.description: Operations that make up the Recommendation. Required.

recommendations.description: Documents summarizing guidance to a Grower from an advisor.

referenceLayer.description: Preformatted geospatial layer to be referenced within the model

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

layerTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Layer Type Representation.  Required.

variables.description: The variables defined within the Reference Layer

spatialRecordsFile.description: GeoParquet or GeoTiff file containing the layer.  Required.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes governing this Reference Layer

referenceLayerIds.description: Ids mapping to the Reference Id of a Reference Layer

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

root.description: When ADAPT data is consolidated into a single dataset (usually as physical files), the Root component acts as the top level entity that contains all available data.  It is serialized as "adapt.json."  Note that it is also possible to use json representations of individual ADAPT components in a distributed service architecture without the container entities (Root, Catalog, Documents, etc.)

catalog.description: Container for data types that are fixed, infrequently changing, or otherwise prerequisite to transactional data.  Master or Reference data, often called Setup or Coding data in agricultural applications.

documents.description: Container for transactional, frequently changing data.   Documents will necessarily reference master data defined in the Catalog.

dataTypeDefinitionVersion.description: Version of the Standard Data Type Definitions used.  If omitted, the current version is assumed.

unitSystemVersion.description: Version identifier describing the ADAPT Unit System used throughout the model.   If omitted, the current version is assumed.

season.description: The span of time for which field operations contribute to a particular growing season.   For many areas, this is approximately a year in length.  E.g., In the northern hemisphere, Season "2022" may extend from the first operations following harvest in the fall of 2021 to the last harvest activities in the fall of 2022.  As such, seasons may overlap in months where harvest operations in the prior season are ongoing as field prep and fertilizer operations are starting for the new season.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

start.description: Start date of the Crop Season.

end.description: End date of the crop season.

spiralAttributes.description: Relevant attributes for the Spiral Guidance Pattern type

lineStrings.description: One or more line strings that compose the Spiral

standardPayableMoisture.description: The targeted moisture value at which the commodity is sold

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

summaryValue.description: A recorded value of a specific type, representing an average or total either calculated by a system or manually-entered by a user.   E.g.s., total amount of fuel used within an operation on a field,

variableId.description: Mapping to a Variable within this Operation that defines the type of data recorded in this object.  Required.

valueText.description: The actual value of the Summary Value represented as text.   The data type of the associated Variable will determine into what type it may be parsed.   Required.

partyRole.description: Any Party Role associated to this Summary Value.   E.g., An equipment operator associated to a fuel usage total.

timeScopes.description: Time Scopes describing the Summary Value data.  E.g., Start and End times for an application total of a specific product within a multi-product Operation.

summaryValues.description: One or more Summary Value records

swathWidth.description: A defined width of a point or pass on a field, based on the implement's active width.

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

telecommunicationContactMethod.description: A telephone number or email address

valueText.description: The value of this contact item.  E.g., phone number.

telecommunicationContactTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Telecommunication Contact Type data type definition.  Required.

textDataTypeDefinitionAttributes.description: Data Type Definition attributes specific to the text type

validationRegularExpression.description: Optional regular expression to validate textual values

timeScope.description: A period of time, optionally containing a defined start or end,  locational context, or simply duration.

duration.description: Duration of the event in seconds.  Included separately from End Date/Time for cases where only the duration is relevant.

start.description: The date and time (UTC) at the start of an event.

end.description: The date and time (UTC) at the end of an event.

dateContextCode.description: Code matching the relevant item in the Date Context Representation.  Required.

trait.description: Genetic attribute of a seed variety

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

manufacturerId.description: Mapping to the manufacturer, where known.

traitCode.description: Manufacturer code that identifies this trait.  Required.

uniqueId.description: A persistent identifier for an entity as defined by a specific source.

idSource.description: Source of the id, where known.

idTypeCode.description: The code that identifies the enumeration item value from the Id Type data type definition.  Required.

idSourceTypeCode.description: Type if the Id Source, if present.

variable.description: An individual type of measurement during a field operation that will be populated at multiple points in the field.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

definitionCode.description:
Code identifying a Data Type Definition, either in the standard list or within the Custom Data Type 
Definitions in this data instance.

fileDataIndex.description: The column index in a corresponding GeoParquet file, or the band index in a corresponding GeoTiff file.   Required when data is reported on Spatial Records.

productId.description: An optional product against which this variable is recorded.  A Variable may linked to a maximum of 1 product.  If a value refers to multiple products, it must be separated into multiple Variables or the Product Id must be omitted.

defaultRate.description: For prescribed variables, the default rate.

outOfFieldRate.description: For prescribed variables, the rate to be used when the applicator is outside the defined field boundary.

lossOfGNSSRate.description: For prescribed variables, the rate to be used when the equipment loses the GNSS signal.

verticalAccuracy.description: The accuracy of the vertical data in the GNSS reading(s)

numericValue.description: The actual value of the Measurement

unitOfMeasureCode.description: The unit of measure for the given value.  Required.

workOrder.description:
Document summarizing the final collection of agronomic instructions (Operations) to be acted upon once operational decisions are taken. A work order documents operational decisions made.  A common example would be a list of fixed or variable rate prescriptions.

The Operations represent agronomic instruction(s) for a single Field or Crop Zone at a single time.  Where a Crop is not known/relevant, the Work Order must reference a Field.  Where a Crop is known, the Work Order must reference a CropZone.  Example WorkItems: a CropZone should be planted and fertilized on a particular date/date range, utilize a prescribed flat rate (Summary Value) or rates (Spatial Records File).  Prescriptions are represented as individual Operations.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

documentCorrelations.description: Optional collection of correlations to other Documents within this data instance.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes describing the Document

cropZoneId.description: Optional mapping to a Crop Zone.

operations.description: The prescribed Operations that comprise this Work Order.  Required.

workOrders.description: Documents summarizing the final agronomic instructions to be acted upon

workRecord.description:
A record of completed work, contemporaneous in nature and scoped to a single Field or Crop Zone.     At least one Operation.   E.g.s., 
-The harvest of a single Crop Zone completed by two combines over several days.   Each combine would record separate Operations.
-The single-pass seeding/starter fertilizer/insecticide application of a corn Crop Zone by one row planter.   The Work Record would contain three Operation objects for each type of application.
-A manual record of total harvested values, without knowledge of the harvesting equipment.   One Operation would record one or more Summary Values.

id.description: Identification entity that defines both an integer instance id (as a primary key) and a collection of persistent identifiers

name.description: The name of this item.  Required.

description.description: A string that describes an object, likely containing more contextual information than a Name.  Optional.

contextItems.description: List of supplemental information for this data element

documentCorrelations.description: Optional collection of correlations to other Documents within this data instance.

timeScopes.description: Any Time Scopes describing the Document

cropZoneId.description: Optional mapping to a Crop Zone.

operations.description:
The completed Operations that comprise this Word Record. Required.

E.g.s., a tractor pulling a row planter with seeding, liquid fertilizer and granular insecticide application capabilities would have its data grouped into 4 constituent Operations: Application - SowingAndPlanting, Application - Fertilizing, Application - Crop Protection, and Vehicle Data Collection.

Manually entered information can also be logged as Summary Values.

workRecords.description: Records of completed work, contemporaneous in nature and scoped to a single Field or Crop Zone
